cards.flavor:
"The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter
cards.name: All Is Dust
cards.text: Each player sacrifices all colored permanents he or she controls.

cards.name: Artisan of Kozilek
cards.text:
When you cast Artisan of Kozilek, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

cards.flavor: The barest taste of Eldrazi power shatters both realms and identities.
cards.name: Eldrazi Conscription
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +10/+10 and has trample and annihilator 2. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

cards.name: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn
cards.text:
Emrakul, the Aeons Torn can't be countered.
When you cast Emrakul, take an extra turn after this one.
Flying, protection from colored spells, annihilator 6
When Emrakul is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

cards.flavor:
"I believed in a beautiful god. But this is the true face of the divine."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric
cards.name: Hand of Emrakul
cards.text:
You may sacrifice four Eldrazi Spawn rather than pay Hand of Emrakul's mana cost.
Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)

cards.name: Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
cards.text:
When you cast Kozilek, Butcher of Truth, draw four cards.
Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)
When Kozilek is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

cards.flavor: Your pleas for death shall go unheard.
cards.name: It That Betrays
cards.text:
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)
Whenever an opponent sacrifices a nontoken permanent, put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Not of This World
cards.text:
Counter target spell or ability that targets a permanent you control.
Not of This World costs {7} less to cast if it targets a spell or ability that targets a creature you control with power 7 or greater.

cards.flavor: No thought but hunger. No strategy but destruction.
cards.name: Pathrazer of Ulamog
cards.text:
Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents.)
Pathrazer of Ulamog can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

cards.flavor:
"The brood spread far faster than we could kill it. I fear the worst is yet to come."
—The War Diaries
cards.name: Skittering Invasion
cards.text: Put five 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.name: Spawnsire of Ulamog
cards.text:
Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)
{4}: Put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
{20}: Cast any number of Eldrazi cards you own from outside the game without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
cards.text:
When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent.
Indestructible
Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)
When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

cards.flavor:
"Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us."
—Nirthu, lone missionary
cards.name: Ulamog's Crusher
cards.text:
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)
Ulamog's Crusher attacks each turn if able.

cards.flavor: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.
cards.name: Affa Guard Hound
cards.text:
Flash
When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

cards.text:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
2/2
LEVEL 5+
5/5
First strike

cards.flavor:
"What we knew as Emeria, Ula, and Cosi were not divine beings at all, but a cruel trick, and a grave error."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Dawnglare Invoker
cards.text:
Flying
{8}: Tap all creatures target player controls.

cards.flavor:
"I should have died that day, but I suffered not a scratch. I awoke in a lake of blood, none of it apparently my own."
—The War Diaries
cards.name: Deathless Angel
cards.text:
Flying
{W}{W}: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The Singing City was silent, the pathway stones were still, and the winds of the Howling Spire ceased.
cards.name: Demystify
cards.text: Destroy target enchantment.

cards.name: Eland Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+4.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.name: Emerge Unscathed
cards.text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Gideon Jura
cards.text:
+2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able.
−2: Destroy target tapped creature.
0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

cards.flavor: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."
cards.name: Glory Seeker

cards.flavor: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"
cards.name: Guard Duty
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender.

cards.flavor: After encasing it in a paralyzing beam of light, the angel studied the Eldrazi as a child would study a bug, curiously and without fear.
cards.name: Harmless Assault
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by attacking creatures.

1/4
If a source would deal damage to you or a creature you control, prevent 1 of that damage.
LEVEL 5+
2/5
If a source would deal damage to you or a creature you control, prevent 2 of that damage.

Enchant creature

Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.flavor:
"I tried to tell her to stay behind, that this fight was too dangerous. I spent the next hour tied to the rafters."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader
cards.name: Kor Line-Slinger
cards.text: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.

cards.flavor: She reaches beyond the physical realm, touching the ideals from which all creatures draw their power.
cards.name: Kor Spiritdancer
cards.text:
Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.

cards.flavor: If you want to kill a lot of goblins, just make sure your defenses look like fun.
cards.name: Lightmine Field
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack, Lightmine Field deals damage to each of those creatures equal to the number of attacking creatures.

cards.flavor: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.
cards.name: Linvala, Keeper of Silence
cards.text:
Flying
Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.

cards.flavor: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.
cards.name: Lone Missionary
cards.text: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

cards.flavor:
"If destiny's champions have arisen to fight the Ancient Ones, then let me, too, do my part."
—Ravuel of Graypelt
cards.name: Luminous Wake
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.
cards.name: Makindi Griffin
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Mammoth Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.flavor: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.
cards.name: Near-Death Experience
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.

cards.name: Nomads' Assembly
cards.text:
Put a 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature token onto the battlefield for each creature you control.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.flavor:
"‘Invincible' is just a word."
—Gideon Jura
cards.name: Oust
cards.text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

cards.flavor:
"The vampires knew what was coming. I know it. And they did nothing. They deserve to feel the same agony they've caused all of us."
—Anitan, Ondu cleric
cards.name: Puncturing Light
cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.

cards.flavor: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.
cards.name: Repel the Darkness
cards.text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"The mighty rely solely on their strength. They are shocked when we do the same."
—Tars Olan, kor world-gift
cards.name: Smite
cards.text: Destroy target blocked creature.

cards.flavor: In truth, her own faith was gone, trodden in Ulamog's wake. She pantomimed the blessing in the hope that it would inspire others to continue to struggle.
cards.name: Soul's Attendant
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: The kor's most righteous dead are given the greatest reward: an eternity tied to the land they so cherish.
cards.name: Soulbound Guardians
cards.text: Defender, flying

cards.flavor:
"Hold fast the line! Either we stop them here or we wake up in their guts!"
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

cards.text:
Defender

You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.flavor: No one spoke. There was no need. The threat of the Eldrazi presented a simple choice: lay down your weapons and die for nothing, or hold them fast and die for something.
cards.name: Time of Heroes
cards.text: Each creature you control with a level counter on it gets +2/+2.

cards.flavor: The kor track hartebeests in hopes of finding magic to help fight the Eldrazi.
cards.name: Totem-Guide Hartebeest
cards.text: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "I have found the courage to face death—twice, if I must."
cards.name: Umbra Mystic
cards.text: Auras attached to permanents you control have totem armor. (If an enchanted permanent you control would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy an Aura attached to it.)

cards.flavor:
"I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi."
—Expedition journal entry
cards.name: Wall of Omens
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Although armor and auras can be similar, the brains required to use them are worlds apart."
—Zilan, Makindi auramancer

cards.text:
Attach target Aura you control to target creature.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"'Fraid of heights? Ride a horse. 'Fraid of missing out? Rein up a drake."
—Trinda, Hada spy patrol

cards.flavor:
"That would have brought shame to you as a mage. Tell you what—I'll keep your secret."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

cards.flavor:
"To distract an archmage would take incredible power. But for a simpleton, something sparkly will do."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

cards.text:
Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"We thought Zendikar's rage was kindled by its explorers and plunderers. But the world had sensed the stirrings of the Eldrazi."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Frostwind Invoker
cards.text:
Flying
{8}: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: As they awakened, the Eldrazi reasserted their mastery over all of Zendikar's natural forces.

cards.text:
Creatures with flying get +2/+0.
Creatures without flying get -2/-0.

cards.flavor: It lingers near the outposts of the Makindi Trenches, inadvertently granting another layer of defense.

Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Guard Gomazoa.

cards.flavor:
"Yeah, they've got a lot of meat. The only downside to eating 'em is that you often find human bones and body parts inside."
—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad
cards.name: Jwari Scuttler

cards.flavor:
"It's good to learn from your failures, but I prefer to learn from the failures of others."
—Jace Beleren
cards.name: Lay Bare

cards.flavor: "The structure gets bigger every hour, with hedrons coalescing even deep under the surface. If I could only get inside . . . ."
cards.name: Merfolk Observer
cards.text: When Merfolk Observer enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.

cards.flavor: "Emeria is a pleasant lie, a figment to hide Emrakul's hideous face. I can only hope to uncover a truth that lies deeper still."
cards.name: Merfolk Skyscout
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Merfolk Skyscout attacks or blocks, untap target permanent.

cards.flavor:
"I'd build an entire fortress of them if I could."
—Mzali, Lighthouse archmage
cards.name: Mnemonic Wall
cards.text:
Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
cards.name: Narcolepsy
cards.text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.

cards.flavor: Create an illusion so strong that it becomes another's reality, and you can become the master of all.
cards.name: Phantasmal Abomination
cards.text:
Defender
When Phantasmal Abomination becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

cards.flavor: From the moment the first Eldrazi spawn squirmed free, everything on Zendikar took on an adjusted meaning, a new slant toward or away from the waking giants.
cards.name: Reality Spasm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Tap X target permanents.
• Untap X target permanents.

cards.name: Recurring Insight
cards.text:
Draw cards equal to the number of cards in target opponent's hand.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.flavor:
"Never look too deep, where the waters turn dark. What the sea has hidden there may not stay down forever."
—Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad
cards.name: Regress
cards.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: To truly know a creature, slither a mile in its tentacles.
cards.name: Renegade Doppelganger
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Renegade Doppelganger become a copy of that creature until end of turn. (If it does, it loses this ability for the rest of the turn.)

cards.flavor: "The secret entrance should be near."
cards.name: Sea Gate Oracle
cards.text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

cards.flavor: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.
cards.name: See Beyond
cards.text: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.

cards.flavor: Riches must be divided, but real wealth can be shared.
cards.name: Shared Discovery
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Shared Discovery, tap four untapped creatures you control.
Draw three cards.

cards.name: Skywatcher Adept
cards.text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-2
2/2
Flying
LEVEL 3+
4/2
Flying

cards.flavor: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."
cards.name: Sphinx of Magosi
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.

cards.name: Surrakar Spellblade
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Surrakar Spellblade.
Whenever Surrakar Spellblade deals combat damage to a player, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.

cards.flavor: Under the master's eye, skills are honed sharper and spells cut deeper.
cards.name: Training Grounds
cards.text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost up to {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.

cards.flavor:
"We're glad to be of service—to be an audience to your failure."
—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage
cards.name: Unified Will
cards.text: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.

cards.flavor: "The unfathomable is upon us, students. I have no doubt you will rise to the occasion."
cards.name: Venerated Teacher
cards.text: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.

cards.flavor: "I would rather take my own head than be thwarted by a presumptuous wretch with a shield and a dream."
cards.name: Arrogant Bloodlord
cards.text: Whenever Arrogant Bloodlord blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with power 1 or less, destroy Arrogant Bloodlord at end of combat.

cards.flavor: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.
cards.name: Bala Ged Scorpion
cards.text: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.

cards.flavor: "Ah, again it does not bode well for you."
cards.name: Baneful Omen
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, each opponent loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor:
"The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Bloodrite Invoker
cards.text: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.
cards.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.
cards.name: Cadaver Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Why does it destroy? It does, and to talk of reasons wastes time and breath."
—Nirthu, lone missionary
cards.name: Consume the Meek
cards.text: Destroy each creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Consuming Vapors
cards.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.flavor:
"The Na Plateau is lost. Do not ask what happened, and never return there."
—Nirthu, lone missionary
cards.name: Contaminated Ground
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

cards.name: Corpsehatch
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor:
"We must all push through the pain to heal our world."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric
cards.name: Curse of Wizardry
cards.text:
As Curse of Wizardry enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.

cards.flavor: Death inevitably seduces all who study it.
cards.name: Death Cultist
cards.text: Sacrifice Death Cultist: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"Morality is just shorthand for the constraints of being powerless."
—Ob Nixilis
cards.name: Demonic Appetite
cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

cards.flavor: "If our former masters would have us kneel again, they shall feel our defiance slashed across their membranes."
cards.name: Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief
cards.text:
Flying
{X}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-X until end of turn and Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.
cards.name: Dread Drone
cards.text: When Dread Drone enters the battlefield, put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: Left masterless by Kozilek, it wandered the wilds, raving in its ceaseless hunger.
cards.name: Escaped Null
cards.text:
Lifelink
Whenever Escaped Null blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Eldrazi grow wherever something else dies.
cards.name: Essence Feed
cards.text: Target player loses 3 life. You gain 3 life and put three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: Scavengers both mundane and magical follow in its wake, feeding on the scraps of flesh and spirit it leaves behind.
cards.name: Gloomhunter
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Guul Draz Assassin
cards.text:
Level up {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 2-3
2/2
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
LEVEL 4+
4/4
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Hellcarver Demon
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Hellcarver Demon deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice all other permanents you control and discard your hand. Exile the top six cards of your library. You may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

cards.flavor: All the angel saw was her doom.
cards.name: Induce Despair
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Induce Despair, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor: You will scream out your innermost secrets just to make it stop.
cards.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

cards.flavor:
"Romanticize it, glamorize it, call it what you will. To me, it will always be carnal, bloody murder."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric
cards.name: Last Kiss
cards.text: Last Kiss deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.
cards.name: Mortician Beetle
cards.text: Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mortician Beetle.

cards.flavor:
"To evade the brood lineages, one must be made dark to all the senses."
—Traga, Zulaport runner
cards.name: Nighthaze
cards.text:
Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Draw a card.

cards.name: Nirkana Cutthroat
cards.text:
Level up {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-2
4/3
Deathtouch
LEVEL 3+
5/4
First strike, deathtouch

cards.flavor: Hate is an everlasting wellspring from which it is eternally sustained.
cards.name: Nirkana Revenant
cards.text:
Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add {B} to your mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
{B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Null Champion
cards.text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
4/2
LEVEL 4+
7/3
{B}: Regenerate Null Champion.

cards.name: Pawn of Ulamog
cards.text: Whenever Pawn of Ulamog or another nontoken creature you control dies, you may put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: It removed only one idea from her mind: defiance.
cards.name: Perish the Thought
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player shuffles that card into his or her library.

cards.flavor: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."
cards.name: Pestilence Demon
cards.text:
Flying
{B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.flavor: Sorin has gathered grudges for centuries, patiently awaiting the day he can exact the perfect vengeance.
cards.name: Repay in Kind
cards.text: Each player's life total becomes the lowest life total among all players.

cards.flavor:
"Have you ever killed insects nibbling at your crops? I think that's what the Eldrazi believe they're doing to us."
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper
cards.name: Shrivel
cards.text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Necromancers are judged by the most powerful undead they've ever created. There are those who have animated just a single being, yet are considered the pinnacle of their dark craft.
cards.name: Skeletal Wurm
cards.text: {B}: Regenerate Skeletal Wurm.

cards.flavor: Ulamog's tentacles, their touch like burning ice, rummaged through his soul and stung his memories one by one.
cards.name: Suffer the Past
cards.text: Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Thought Gorger
cards.text:
Trample
When Thought Gorger enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card in your hand. If you do, discard your hand.
When Thought Gorger leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.flavor:
"Consider my debt to your kin paid in full."
—Idrol, Guul Draz assassin
cards.name: Vendetta
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.name: Virulent Swipe
cards.text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.flavor: It haunts the remnants of the Helix of Zof, leeching strength from the vast Eldrazi ruin.
cards.name: Zof Shade
cards.text: {2}{B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Zulaport Enforcer
cards.text:
Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-2
3/3
LEVEL 3+
5/5
Zulaport Enforcer can't be blocked except by black creatures.

cards.flavor:
"If you're in Akoum and you glimpse a shadow overhead, the worst thing you can do is duck."
—Chadir the Navigator
cards.name: Akoum Boulderfoot
cards.text: When Akoum Boulderfoot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword."
—Yannash, outpost builder
cards.name: Battle Rampart
cards.text:
Defender
{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.
cards.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Brimstone Mage
cards.text:
Level up {3}{R} ({3}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-2
2/3
{T}: Brimstone Mage deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
LEVEL 3+
2/4
{T}: Brimstone Mage deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Brood Birthing
cards.text: If you control an Eldrazi Spawn, put three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool." Otherwise, put one of those tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: It speaks no commands but is always obeyed.
cards.name: Conquering Manticore
cards.text:
Flying
When Conquering Manticore enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Things born in magma are always angry.
cards.name: Devastating Summons
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Devastating Summons, sacrifice X lands.
Put two X/X red Elemental creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Disaster Radius
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Disaster Radius, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.
cards.name: Emrakul's Hatcher
cards.text: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, put three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.name: Explosive Revelation
cards.text: Choose target creature or player. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Explosive Revelation deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature or player. Put the nonland card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor:
"Something down there has an appetite for what we're standing on. Let's hope it doesn't want seconds."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House
cards.name: Fissure Vent
cards.text:
Choose one or both —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target nonbasic land.

cards.flavor: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.
cards.name: Flame Slash
cards.text: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor:
"Play no favorites. Everybody dies."
—Sparkmage saying
cards.name: Forked Bolt
cards.text: Forked Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

cards.flavor: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.
cards.name: Goblin Arsonist
cards.text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House
cards.name: Goblin Tunneler
cards.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor:
"I don't think he's bringing in the mail . . . ."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain
cards.name: Grotag Siege-Runner
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Grotag Siege-Runner: Destroy target creature with defender. Grotag Siege-Runner deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.flavor:
"There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House
cards.name: Heat Ray
cards.text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: Just when you thought you'd be safe, in the middle of an open field with no Eldrazi around for miles.
cards.name: Hellion Eruption
cards.text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then put that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Kargan Dragonlord
cards.text:
Level up {R} ({R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 4-7
4/4
Flying
LEVEL 8+
8/8
Flying, trample
{R}: Kargan Dragonlord gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.
cards.name: Kiln Fiend
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Tracing their ancestry back to Zendikar's earliest forms of life, lagac lizards have seen the comings and goings of planeswalkers and the Eldrazi, and the rise of the vampire clans, none of which has changed them one bit.
cards.name: Lagac Lizard

cards.flavor:
"Then the ancient masters themselves, towers of rapacity, rose and began their calamitous feast."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Lavafume Invoker
cards.text: {8}: Creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Lord of Shatterskull Pass
cards.text:
Level up {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-5
6/6
LEVEL 6+
6/6
Whenever Lord of Shatterskull Pass attacks, it deals 6 damage to each creature defending player controls.

cards.name: Lust for War
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Lust for War deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
Enchanted creature attacks each turn if able.

cards.flavor:
"The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw."
—Jaji, magmaw worshipper
cards.name: Magmaw
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice a nonland permanent: Magmaw deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor:
"You have to appreciate the genius of it. Why bother building defenses when you can just fill the pass with angry ogres?"
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter
cards.name: Ogre Sentry
cards.text: Defender

cards.flavor: The settlement knew there was something strange about the cloud when the old priest Mandli suddenly grabbed an axe and ran screaming into the hills.
cards.name: Rage Nimbus
cards.text:
Defender, flying
{1}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

cards.flavor: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.
cards.name: Raid Bombardment
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to defending player.

cards.name: Rapacious One
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Rapacious One deals combat damage to a player, put that many 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: It draws its strength from those around it, but the pleasure of destruction is all its own.
cards.name: Soulsurge Elemental
cards.text:
First strike
Soulsurge Elemental's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.

cards.flavor: Death by death, Kozilek's lineage spread.
cards.name: Spawning Breath
cards.text: Spawning Breath deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: "I know just the person for that job."
cards.name: Splinter Twin
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Put a token that's a copy of this creature onto the battlefield. That token has haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step."

cards.name: Staggershock
cards.text:
Staggershock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Surreal Memoir
cards.text:
Return an instant card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.flavor: The horror lurched about like a puppet from a madman's nightmare, squeezing the life from its own kind.
cards.name: Traitorous Instinct
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

cards.flavor: Remade by Eldrazi magic, Tuktuk inspired an entire clan of misguided goblins.
cards.name: Tuktuk the Explorer
cards.text:
Haste
When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, put a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token named Tuktuk the Returned onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"Just move very slowly, and for the love of Ula, do not get it mad."
—Chadir the Navigator
cards.name: Valakut Fireboar
cards.text: Whenever Valakut Fireboar attacks, switch its power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone."
—The War Diaries
cards.name: Vent Sentinel
cards.text:
Defender
{1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures with defender you control.

cards.name: World at War
cards.text:
After the first postcombat main phase this turn, there's an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.flavor:
"Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed."
—The War Diaries
cards.name: Wrap in Flames
cards.text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

cards.name: Ancient Stirrings
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.)

cards.flavor: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.
cards.name: Aura Gnarlid
cards.text:
Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it.
Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.

cards.flavor: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.
cards.name: Awakening Zone
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.name: Bear Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control."
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.name: Beastbreaker of Bala Ged
cards.text:
Level up {2}{G} ({2}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
4/4

6/6

cards.flavor: "From in here, everything looks like dinner."
cards.name: Boar Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.flavor: A bramblesnap is formed by grafting together thirteen different plants that already hunger for meat.
cards.name: Bramblesnap
cards.text:
Trample
Tap an untapped creature you control: Bramblesnap gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"The least of gods shall tower over the mightiest of mortals, and death shall reign over all."
—Crypt of Agadeem inscription
cards.name: Broodwarden
cards.text: Eldrazi Spawn creatures you control get +2/+1.

cards.flavor:
"Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?"
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House
cards.name: Daggerback Basilisk
cards.text: Deathtouch

cards.flavor: Even as the world was left cracked and gory by the marauding Eldrazi, new life began to drip from its wounds.
cards.name: Gelatinous Genesis
cards.text: Put X X/X green Ooze creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "All life is driven by an indomitable will to survive. I simply turn that into something more . . . tangible."
cards.name: Gigantomancer
cards.text: {1}: Target creature you control has base power and toughness 7/7 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Storms spread throughout Oran-Rief, ripping the skies with wind and rain. Airborne creatures sought shelter where they could.
cards.name: Gravity Well
cards.text: Whenever a creature with flying attacks, it loses flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Growth Spasm
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: Its breath leaves its prey too drowsy to struggle.
cards.name: Haze Frog
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Haze Frog enters the battlefield, prevent all combat damage that other creatures would deal this turn.

cards.flavor: The baloth's instincts boiled, its muscles pulled taut, and its razor-spines bristled, as it turned to face—a runt meepling.
cards.name: Irresistible Prey
cards.text:
Target creature must be blocked this turn if able.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Nature's arms encircle all who are willing to draw close.
cards.name: Jaddi Lifestrider
cards.text: When Jaddi Lifestrider enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 2 life for each creature tapped this way.

cards.name: Joraga Treespeaker
cards.text:
Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
1/2
{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.
LEVEL 5+
1/4
Elves you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool."

cards.name: Kazandu Tuskcaller
cards.text:
Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 2-5
1/1
{T}: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.
LEVEL 6+
1/1
{T}: Put two 3/3 green Elephant creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"In ages past, bargains were struck and promises were made. Now we must collect on our debt. Begin the hymns."
—Moruul, Khalni druid
cards.name: Khalni Hydra
cards.text:
Khalni Hydra costs {G} less to cast for each green creature you control.
Trample

cards.flavor: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.
cards.name: Kozilek's Predator
cards.text: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor:
"Those who think the trees shall remain bystanders throughout this conflict shall be sorely mistaken."
—Sutina, Speaker of the Tajuru
cards.name: Leaf Arrow
cards.text: Leaf Arrow deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.

cards.flavor: "That our enemies are great only brings us greater hope."
cards.name: Living Destiny
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Living Destiny, reveal a creature card from your hand.
You gain life equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.
cards.name: Might of the Masses
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

cards.flavor: It wasn't long until the elves had developed a use for every part of the Eldrazi.
cards.name: Momentous Fall
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Momentous Fall, sacrifice a creature.
You draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then you gain life equal to its toughness.

cards.name: Mul Daya Channelers
cards.text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, Mul Daya Channelers gets +3/+3.
As long as the top card of your library is a land card, Mul Daya Channelers has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."

cards.flavor:
"The scholars wept when we destroyed the hedron. I had no such pity. What would this world be like had we done so sooner?"
—The War Diaries
cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: In one gargantuan bite, it will swallow not only you but also the riverbank you were standing on.
cards.name: Nema Siltlurker

cards.flavor: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.
cards.name: Nest Invader
cards.text: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.
cards.name: Ondu Giant
cards.text: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies."
—The War Diaries
cards.name: Overgrown Battlement
cards.text:
Defender
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each creature with defender you control.

cards.flavor: It eats what it wants to eat—which is anything that moves.
cards.name: Pelakka Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life.
When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

cards.name: Prey's Vengeance
cards.text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Realms Uncharted
cards.text: Search your library for up to four land cards with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Snake Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card."
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.name: Spider Umbra
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

cards.flavor:
"They don't move much, but then again, if you get caught in its web, it has all the time in the world to get to you."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter
cards.name: Sporecap Spider
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

cards.flavor:
"This one is only a yearling, but it would be wise to move away before we provide it with excellent hunting practice."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House
cards.name: Stomper Cub
cards.text: Trample

cards.flavor: "No more blood shall be spilled to satisfy another's deluded lust for power."
cards.name: Tajuru Preserver
cards.text: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

cards.flavor: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.
cards.name: Vengevine
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Wildheart Invoker
cards.text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Sarkhan the Mad
cards.text:
0: Reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Sarkhan the Mad deals damage to himself equal to that card's converted mana cost.
−2: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then that player puts a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
−4: Each Dragon creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player.

cards.flavor: It holds a whisper from Iona: "Persevere."
cards.name: Angelheart Vial
cards.text:
Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many charge counters on Angelheart Vial.
{2}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from Angelheart Vial: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

cards.flavor: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.
cards.name: Dreamstone Hedron
cards.text:
{T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

cards.flavor: Golems conjured from the debris of Enatu Temple provided a sturdy but expendable first line of defense against the Eldrazi.
cards.name: Enatu Golem
cards.text: When Enatu Golem dies, you gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: The hedrons awoke along with the Eldrazi, forming superstructures that radiated overwhelming magic.
cards.name: Hedron Matrix
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its converted mana cost.
Equip {4}

cards.flavor: As it spins, dead voices shriek in an ever-increasing cacophony, rending the mind asunder.
cards.name: Keening Stone
cards.text: {5}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.

cards.flavor: She adopted the weapon of the slave-lord Kazuul, and with it, all his cruelty.
cards.name: Ogre's Cleaver
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +5/+0.
Equip {5}

cards.flavor: Draped with the pennon of a fallen outpost, the sword came to symbolize the peoples of Zendikar becoming one.
cards.name: Pennon Blade
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.
Equip {4}

cards.flavor: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."
cards.name: Prophetic Prism
cards.text:
When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Built of wood and iron. Held together by hope and prayer.
cards.name: Reinforced Bulwark
cards.text:
Defender
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

cards.flavor: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.
cards.name: Runed Servitor
cards.text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

cards.flavor: Its host's final curse lies captured within.
cards.name: Sphinx-Bone Wand
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

cards.flavor: The best defense is a good offense.
cards.name: Warmonger's Chariot
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
As long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: Each temple is a door to a horrible future.
cards.name: Eldrazi Temple
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.

cards.flavor: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.
cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
